overview: A widowed doctor of both Chinese and European descent falls in love with a married American correspondent in Hong Kong during China's Communist revolution.
tagline: The price they pay when they come out of their secret garden and face the world in modern-day Hong Kong - makes this one of the screen's unforgettable experiences!
cast: William Holden|Jennifer Jones|Torin Thatcher|Isobel Elsom|Murray Matheson
